title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, July 31, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss reports the latest military actions to his wife, comments on affairs at home, and gives advice to his wife.
keywords: Camp Life, Military Authority, Troop Movement, Battle Description, Family, Home Front, Medicine/Hospitals, Slavery, African Americans, Death/Casualties, Church/Religious Activity, American Civil War
